name: Hazy crazy
author: idysphoria
notes:
Yet another Hazy build,
I was always happy to have a soul exchange in my hand so I kept three ( especially in my starting hand)
Caninetaur combines well with flame tiger, it is also useful to mill your deck for later sphinx plays or when you want to shuffle the deck 
Most decks can't deal with a boosted Hazy if you don't attack so it is sometimes better to be patient.
